flow.name: Venmo Onboarding Flow
flow.description: Guides users through creating a Venmo account, verifying their identity, and agreeing to legal terms.

screens.description: Entry screen where users can create an account or log in.
User chooses between Personal, Teen, or Business account types.
Collect and confirm the user’s phone number.
User enters 6-digit OTP sent via SMS.
User enters personal information including name, birth date, and address.
User reviews and accepts Venmo’s legal agreements to complete onboarding.
